snippet: An actuary describes the long and winding road to obtaining a patent — in his case, for a statistical sampling method that can be used by insurance companies.
abstract: Preoccupations column features actuary Jay Vadiveloo describing the long process to obtain two patents for a statistical sampling method that can be used by insurance companies.
lead_paragraph: An actuary describes the long and winding road to obtaining a patent — in his case, for a statistical sampling method that can be used by insurance companies.

headline.seo: An Actuary Proves Patents Aren’t Only for Engineers
